[ C ] (symbol ¥) the standard unit of money used in Japan: She earns 400,000 yen a month as an English teacher in Tokyo. the yen
[ S ] the value of the yen, used in comparing the values of different types of money from around the world: The yen fell/rose against (= was worth less/more compared to) the dollar today.

MONEY the standard unit of money used in Japan: The stock rose 2,000 yen to 375,000. The company plans to cut 800 jobs, saving an estimated 3 billion yen in costs.
FINANCE, STOCK MARKET
  (also the yen) (also the Japanese yen) the value of the yen compared to the value of currencies of other countries: The dollar rose against the yen.
